comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Black and White [AllEdges], and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 22064831@N02
comment._content: This is gorgeous! And this is the vista I used to get so often when I took a walk at lunch time when I worked at Christchurch Polytechnic Institute of Technology just few blocks away. (70-80 years later)

comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content:
Thanks Mirla Elizabeth. One of the reasons I picked these panoramas is that they have such specific locations, especially the urban scenes. Nice to know they're ringing bells for people.

cheers, Courtney
